formulas.title: Formula (extracted text)
formulas.raw: Payment: \( P = \dfrac{L\,r}{1 - (1+r)^{-n}} \), where \( L \) is principal, \( r \) the period rate, and \( n \) total periods. Per period \(k\): \( \text{Interest}_k = B_{k-1}\,r \), \( \text{Principal}_k = P - \text{Interest}_k \), \( B_k = B_{k-1} - \text{Principal}_k - \text{Extra}_k \). Zero-rate case: \( P = \dfrac{L}{n} \), \( \text{Interest}_k = 0 \).
